Figure B.12. Simulated multilabel experiment with label distribution (26). Methods are the
true oracle con dence set; the conformalized direct inner/outer method (CDioC), Alg. 3; and
tree-based methods with implicit con dence sets bCimpor explicit inner/outer sets bCio, labeled
ArbiTree and PGM (see description in Sec. 4.1.2). Top: distribution of the inner sets byinsizes.
Bottom: distribution of the outer sets byoutsizes.
